title: McCain's 'Soldiers:' 13 Ordinary People Transformed By Battle
teaser: In his new book, Sen. John McCain tells the stories of 13 U.S. soldiers in wars from the Revolution to Iraq. NPR's Linda Wertheimer speaks with the senator about his book, Thirteen Soldiers.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
